txt.en:
'While your efforts against the wolf-keepers at Barad Morlas have certainly hindered the plans of the White Hand, they have not halted their search. They are driven by the chief of their keepers, a creature who goes by the name of Nûkhud, Wolf-master.

'I would have you return to Barad Morlas and defeat Nûkhud. His defeat should drive fear into the hearts of the half-orcs and their wolf allies.

'Nûkhud was last seen ranging beyond the ruins west of the bridge in Barad Morlas, south-west of here. Be careful, [placeholder]... he is certain to be a dangerous foe.'
'Ha! Nûkhud's demise should give the half-orcs pause! Well done, [placeholder].'
'Nûkhud's defeat should drive terror into the hearts of the half-orcs at Barad Morlas. Go now and see to his demise.'
'The wolves of Saruman will learn to fear us, thanks to you!'
You defeated many wolf-keepers at Barad Morlas, but Dornhador still has one more task for you.
Nûkhud, Wolf-master is at Barad Morlas, south-west of Echad Eregion.\n\nDornhador has asked you to find and defeat Nûkhud, Wolf-master, the leader of the wolf-keepers at Barad Morlas.
Talk to Dornhador at Echad Eregion
Dornhador is at Echad Eregion, north-east of Barad Morlas.\n\nYou should return to Dornhador with tidings of Nûkhud's downfall.
